name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube: No Shorts, No Community, No Nonsense

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables different sections for a more enjoyable experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose which sections you'd like to block from loading to save your sanity from the gobble-de-gook they attract. Don't let unwanted content take up your time and space.
